posts.title: Sun Platinum
posts.description:
Beauty Salon Sun’s official website creation.

We’ve done creating a business card and invitation card, web design, photo shooting and web coding. There’d been absolute nothing to use for the website but only one concept: ‘gentle, warm and bright like the sun’.
I went to the salon for photo shooting for the first time of my work and now the photos are used on the main background.
Also I’ve introduced some cool and trendy animations like Javascript Ajax load and the whole website works seamlessly without paginations.
posts.skillset: Photoshop, Illustrator, Kiev 88, HTML5, css3, Javascript, JQuery, Ajax, Instagram API
